item.title: Install V2ray
item.description: I can not write this in Chinese , but I really want to write it down . first please get an ECS or VPS which can visit the world outside of the wall. CentOS 7.x + Debian Ubuntu 18.x + i choose Cent OS 8.3, so the following content is based on Cent OS 8. second download the installation script by this command. curl -O https://raw.githubusercontent.com/v2fly/fhs-install-v2ray/master/install-release.sh then you will get a file which named ‘install-release.
